description: Provided company users with tech support for IT problems
Maintained knowledge of advances in information technology systems and applications.
Tracked and prioritized IT tickets and requests based on severity and potential business disruptions involved.
Assisted customers with various types of technical issues via email, live chat and telephone.
Promoted high customer satisfaction by resolving problems with knowledgeable  and friendly service
Asset Management and Asset Tracking
Provided exceptional customer service, assisting clients courteously and efficiently.
Exhibited String verbal and written communication skills with a high level of professionalism.
Effectively conveyed technical information to individuals with diverse backgrounds.
Demonstrated proficient knowledge of Windows 10 & 11 And MS Office 365.
Showcased expertise in Audio-Visual equipment, including projectors and microphones.
Acquired knowledge of current Android and IOS devices, providing comprehensive technical support.

projects.name: UI/UX realtor Application
description: Made a user-centered prototype of a realtor application for Android/IOS as a part of a team of 4 members.
Designed the basic wireframe and later made its prototype using Adobe XD.
Made sign up, Home page, Home Screen, rent/sell tab along with animation and transitions
Documented the user requirements and the use cases as a part of the progress report.
Learned skills like team work, time management, communication, creativity and problem solving.

projects.name: Sheridan Bagel Cart
description: Made a GUI Application using Java Fx in NetBeans named Sheridan Shopping Cart.
Designed its basic layout in the Scene Builder and then coding it's to make its components and buttons functional
Used in OOP principles to make the code extensible and reusable.
Sharing insights and best practices within the team to foster a continuous learning environment.
Key Feature - Calculating the price, Saving the receipt and printing the receipt.

projects.name: Weather Application
description: Made a Weather Application using JavaScript, HTML and CSS.
The data for the application is from OPENWeather API which is a Restful API
Used Bootstrap to make the Web application responsive.

projects.name: Takeaway Card Game
description: Design a console interface that is easy to navigate and provides clear instructions to the user using JAVA
Implement clear and concise prompts to guide the player through each turn or level
Implement robust error handling and input validation to prevent unexpected crashes and provide helpful feedback to the user
Clearly communicate any errors or invalid inputs and guide the player on how to correct them.
